description: Base Go preset intended to be extended by more complete presets. It provides the common,
suggested, and scoped Renovate configuration for Go-based projects. Use this as the foundation
for Go repositories; higher-level presets can add scheduling, labels, reviewers, automerge
policies, or repository-specific rules on top
Group all golangci-lint updates into a single PR. Matches both golangci/golangci-lint and
golangci-lint package names. Useful when version bumps are managed by different Renovate
managers across multiple places (e.g. Go modules, Makefiles, GitHub Actions, Mise)
